Name: Highway Madness
About the game: Highway Madness is a social VR game where you get to play with old and new friends from all over the world! Pick your character then choose from a selection of fun games including Standoff, Road Crossing, Roof jumping and Shootout! So what are you waiting for? Come on in and join the Highway Madness! Features: - Enter into the main game lobby, select from a list of 12 hilarious characters available and meet new players! - Online multiplayer VR game so you can play with people from all over the world! - 4 game modes: Road crossing, Roof jumping, Standoff, and Shootout with more being added very soon! - Some game modes even have multiple arenas - Go for a quick match with random players or host a game and invite your steam friends - Awesome power-ups that will help you knock down opponents! - Highway Madness is cross-platform game allowing you to play with HTC Vive and Oculus users! Make sure to jump on the Highway Madness Discord Channel to chat with the devs, give your feedback and meet other Highway Madness players. We're waiting for you here: Enjoy!
